message.raw:
Update to stampede docs for compilation of numpy under MKL.

We now appear to be working with MKL as well as OpenBLAS
on Stampede.  Numpy passes np.test(); legendre_transforms
pass test_legendre_transform.py accuracy test.  Timing
indicates that the MKL transforms are slow, but we may
be seeing a threading discrepency between MKL and openblas
(unclear whether the chosen MKL library handles threads).

message:
Update to stampede docs for compilation of numpy under MKL.

We now appear to be working with MKL as well as OpenBLAS
on Stampede.  Numpy passes np.test(); legendre_transforms
pass test_legendre_transform.py accuracy test.  Timing
indicates that the MKL transforms are slow, but we may
be seeing a threading discrepency between MKL and openblas
(unclear whether the chosen MKL library handles threads).
